name: Rocking On Heaven's Door
description:
Revive the glory of the old days by reforming your band.
But first...Get the hell out of heaven!

Return to Earth and battle through heaven's doors using
your trusty guitar with a variety of combos and moves.
You can also get a little help from one of your friends!
Or even, duke it out in the versus mode to see who's packin'
the most rockin' skills.
